H0.text: In what modern-day country would you find Machu Picchu. Chile

H1.text: In what modern-day country would you find Machu Picchu. Argentina

H2.text: In what modern-day country would you find Machu Picchu. Colombia

H3.text: In what modern-day country would you find Machu Picchu. Peru

A4.text: Machu Picchu is located in the Eastern Cordillera of southern Peru on a mountain ridge at 2,430 meters (7,970 ft).

A5.text: It is situated in the Machupicchu District of Urubamba Province about 80 kilometers (50 miles) northwest of Cusco, above the Sacred Valley and along the Urubamba River.
